alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Miami; Preble; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:11AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WAYNE, SHELBY, NORTHERN PREBLE, DARKE, AUGLAIZE, MERCER AND WESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EST... At 311 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Fort Wayne to 7 miles northeast of Lawrence, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Greenville, Celina, Wapakoneta, Tipp City, Eaton, St. Marys, West Milton, Coldwater, Centerville, Cambridge City, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Covington and St. Henry. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 17. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 72 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Miami; Preble; Shelby
